page.title: 13Life at Home 1922-1939
page.content: In this era houses were not very big having two rooms upstairs and two rooms downstairs.The mother and father and the two youngest of the family in one large room and the others slept in another room. Down-stairs there was a kitchen where they would wash,eat,and cook. Their meals were meat and lots of vegetables grown by their father. Each family would have a pig and hens,Some families would have a pet dog and cat. For Christmas one family would kill a pig and share it with his friend,and his friend would kill his pig in the summer and share it. As soon as you were twelve if you were a boy you could start work on the farm and if you were a girl you could work in a big house.
